text: Bill Bailey's Birdwatching Bonanza is a British television game show. It is produced by Fever Media and Glass Box. It is broadcast on Sky1. The fist episode aired on 8 January 2010. The final episode aired on 12 February 2010. The show is presented by Bill Bailey. He gives two teams birdwatching challenges over a three-day period. The two teams are captained by Alex Zane and Jeff Green. ==Episode list== The colour of the backgrounds shows the result of the show: : – means Alex's team won : – means Jeff's team won : – means the game ended in a draw Episode First broadcast Alex's guest Jeff's guest Score 1 8 January 2010 Kara Tointon Joe Swash 4–3 2 15 January 2010 Sherrie Hewson Joe Pasquale 3–3 3 22 January 2010 Stephen K. Amos Camilla Dallerup Bailey only said who won this episode. He did not say what the score was. 4 29 January 2010 Donal MacIntyre Jayne Middlemiss 5 5 February 2010 Kim Woodburn Kelvin MacKenzie 6 12 February 2010 Trudie Goodwin Josie d'Arby 3–2 ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2010s British television series Category:2010 British television series debuts Category:2010 British television series endings
title: Bill Bailey's Birdwatching Bonanza
